docs.title: Button Counter using ipywidgets
docs.text: This is an app that count the number of times a button is clicked. It uses ipywidgets to create the button and display the number of clicks.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Open Jupyter Notebook.
  3. Run the following code in the notebook.
  4. Click on the button to see the number of clicks.
